TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SessionStateStoreData extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents session-state data for a session store.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData>類別可由 ASP.NET 和自訂的工作階段狀態存放區的實施者來傳遞工作階段狀態資訊的<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateModule>。
<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData>類別用來代表工作階段儲存區的工作階段狀態資料<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateModule>。 <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData>物件包含的工作階段狀態變數的名稱和值，靜態物件參考和<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.Timeout%2A>目前工作階段的資訊。

MemberSignature.Value: public SessionStateStoreData (System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection sessionItems, System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection staticObjects, int timeout);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection sessionItems, class System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection staticObjects, int32 timeout) cil managed
Public Sub New (sessionItems As ISessionStateItemCollection, staticObjects As HttpStaticObjectsCollection, timeout As Integer)
public: SessionStateStoreData(System::Web::SessionState::ISessionStateItemCollection ^ sessionItems, System::Web::HttpStaticObjectsCollection ^ staticObjects, int timeout);
new System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData : System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection * System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection * int -> System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData

Docs.param: The session variables and values for the current session.
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData>類別用來代表工作階段儲存區的工作階段狀態資料<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateModule>。 <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData>物件包含的工作階段狀態變數的名稱和值，靜態物件參考和<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.Timeout%2A>目前工作階段的資訊。
<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData>類別可由 ASP.NET 和自訂的工作階段狀態存放區的實施者來傳遞工作階段狀態資訊的<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateModule>。
自訂工作階段的存放區實作者建構<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData>物件中的實作<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.GetItem%2A>， <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.GetItemExclusive%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.CreateNewStoreData%2A>方法。

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection Items { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection Items
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Items As ISessionStateItemCollection
public: virtual property System::Web::SessionState::ISessionStateItemCollection ^ Items { System::Web::SessionState::ISessionStateItemCollection ^ get(); };
member this.Items : System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection

Docs.summary: The session variables and values for the current session.
Docs.value: 物件，其中包含目前工作階段的變數和值。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.Items%2A>屬性參考會公開至 ASP.NET 應用程式程式碼使用的工作階段狀態變數<xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState>類別，可使用存取<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>或<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>執行個體。
根據預設，工作階段狀態變數會管理使用<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection>物件。 自訂工作階段的存放區實作者可以提供自己的實作<xref:System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection>介面。

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection StaticObjects { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection StaticObjects
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property StaticObjects As HttpStaticObjectsCollection
public: virtual property System::Web::HttpStaticObjectsCollection ^ StaticObjects { System::Web::HttpStaticObjectsCollection ^ get(); };
member this.StaticObjects : System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of objects declared by tags within the ASP.NET application file Global.asax.
Docs.value: Global.asax 檔中包含物件宣告。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 必須提供
<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.StaticObjects%2A> 屬性被提供為了與 ASP 的舊版本相容。
自訂工作階段的存放區實作者可以取得參考<xref:System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection>目前類別<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>執行個體使用<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility.GetSessionStaticObjects%2A>方法。
> [!NOTE] > 自訂物件儲存在<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.StaticObjects%2A>集合必須支援二進位序列化。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[二進位序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/binary-serialization.md)。

.property instance int32 Timeout
Public Overridable Property Timeout As Integer
public: virtual property int Timeout { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Timeout : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets and sets the amount of time, in minutes, allowed between requests before the session-state provider terminates the session.
Docs.value: 以分鐘為單位的逾時期限。
